CdrDoc.CdrDocXml:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>
<xsl:transform version = '1.0' xmlns:xsl = 'http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' xmlns:cdr = 'cips.nci.nih.gov/cdr'>
<xsl:output method = 'xml'/>
<!-- ======================================================================= Copy most things straight through. ======================================================================= --> <xsl:template match = '@*|node()|comment()| processing-instruction()'> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select = '@*|node()|comment()| processing-instruction()'/> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template>
<!-- ====================================================================== Add place holder for new ExternalSites element. ====================================================================== --> <xsl:template match = "ProtocolAdminInfo"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select = "@*|CurrentProtocolStatus| ProtocolLeadOrg| ExternalSites[not(@Source='RSS')]"/> <xsl:value-of select = "'@@RSSSITES@@'"/> <xsl:apply-templates select = "DatedAction"/> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template>
<!-- ====================================================================== Strip protocol site children of RSS lead orgs. ====================================================================== --> <xsl:template match = "ProtocolSites"> <xsl:if test = "not(../UpdateMode[@MailerType= 'Protocol_SandP']='RSS')"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select = '@*|node()|comment()| processing-instruction()'/> </xsl:copy> </xsl:if> </xsl:template>
</xsl:transform>
